wordpressPost.title: Knowing how to fight can be very helpful
wordpressPost.content: So I learned a valuable life lesson last night. When you're trying to valiantly protect the girls it's much much better if you actually know what you're doing. Otherwise all that happens is you don't protect anyone and get something like this:
